Projects

Here’s a collection of projects I’ve worked on!

C Shell

A POSIX-compliant custom shell implementation in C for a course project, featuring interactive prompts, sophisticated command parsing, built-in utilities, pipes, I/O redirection, and comprehensive process control. Has a modular design, support for 50+ background and sequential commands, and comprehensive signal handling.

Systems Programming C
GitHub

xv6-riscv modifications

Engineered modifications to xv6-riscv: a CFS scheduler to drastically boost response time, MLFQ with 4 queues to ensure fair scheduling, and FCFS scheduler for a baseline along with Round-Robin. Ran experiments under varying workloads and examined the performance difference across these schedulers. Comprehensively analysed their strengths and weaknesses. Implemented a Demand Paging system with lazy loading and FIFO and NRU replacement policies from scratch, optimizing memory.

Systems Programming C
